data.message: how do I see my year

replies.message: Hey Kimberly. You can create your own Year in Review by selecting “See Your Year” from the top of your News Feed. You can also access your Year in Review by viewing a friend's Year in Review on their Timeline or by visiting facebook.com/yearinreview. -Hailey
I can see my year in review but there is no option to share at the end of it. How do I share??

Thanks for your question, Greg. You can share your Year in Review by selecting share in the top right. You can also choose who you share it with by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/18N0StN.
-Chantal
I do not have the share option at the top right of my album? Why is this
